com.ibm.team.process.common

Interface IAccessGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAccessGroupHandle, IAuditable, IAuditableHandle, IItem, IItemHandle, IManagedItem, IManagedItemHandle

    public interface IAccessGroup
extends IAccessGroupHandle, IAuditable
    An access group represents a group of items that are used as a context to provide read access to one or more items.
    Since:
    1.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IAccessGroup.ReadAccessContextType
      Represents the types of read access contexts that can be maintained by the members that make up the group

    • Field Summary

      • isArchived

        boolean isArchived()
        Indicates whether the access group is in an archived state.
        Returns:
        true if the access group is in an archived state.

      • setDescription

        Sets the description of the access group.

      • getItems

        IItemHandle[] getItems()
        Retrieves the items that make up the context members of the access group. It is a convenience method that simple returns only the item handles that would be returned in the call to getMembers().
        Returns:
        the items that make up the context members of the access group.

      • getMembers

        IAccessGroupMember[] getMembers()
        Retrieves the members of the access group.
        Returns:
        the members of the access group.

      • add

        void add(IContributorHandle contributorHandle)
        Adds a contributor to the access group.
        Parameters:
        contributorHandle - the contributor to add to the access group.

      • add

        void add(IProcessAreaHandle processAreaHandle,
       IAccessGroup.ReadAccessContextType contextType)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a process area to the access group.
        Parameters:
        processAreaHandle - the process area to add to the access group.
        contextType - The context in which the process area should be add
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if IAccessGroup.ReadAccessContextType enum value of CONTRIBUTOR is used as the context type

      • remove

        void remove(IContributorHandle contributorHandle)
        Removes a contributor from the access group.
        Parameters:
        contributorHandle - the contributor to remove from the access group.

      • remove

        void remove(IProcessAreaHandle processAreaHandle)
        Removes a process area from the access group.
        Parameters:
        processAreaHandle - the process area to remove from the access group.

      • remove

        void remove(IAccessGroupMember member)
        Removes an access group member from the access group.
        Parameters:
        member - the member to remove from the access group

      • getGroupContextId

        UUID getGroupContextId()
        Retrieves the context id that represents members that make up the group. It may or may not be the same value as the context id for the access group item itself.
        Returns:
        The context id that represents members that make up the group

      • getOwningApplicationKey

        java.lang.String getOwningApplicationKey()
        Retrieves the owning application key for the access group
        Returns:
        the owning application key for the access group
